name: App User
description: Client that can request tow trucks

name: App admin
description: Can delete any actor in the system, and they would need to re-register if they want to join the system again

name: Tow truck agency admin
description: Can register as a company which will generate a company signup link with a company where drivers can register.

name: Tow truck driver
description: Can register to a specific company using as lug link that contains the company ID

name: Insurance company
description: Can generate codes that the app users can in turn use to pay for their trips. The insurance company will later be billed according to the used codes

name: Tow Truck Company
description: Can generate codes that the app users can in turn use to pay for their trips. The insurance company will later be billed according to the used codes
